channel.title: ubiquitin on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in ubiquitin on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnaC03.EFO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC03G0157400ZS Gene Symbol: BnaC03.EFO1 Gene Name: EARLY FLOWERING BY OVEREXPRESSION 1 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnaC03.

item.title: BnaMs3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC9.Tic40 Gene Symbol: BnaMs3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: In Brassica napus, the widely used genic male sterile breeding system 7365ABC is controlled by two young genes, Bnams4b and BnaMs3.

item.title: Bnams4b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Bnams4b Gene Name: Brassica napus male sterile 4 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Ectopic expression of AtBRUTUS (AtBTS) and comparison between Bnams4b-transgenic Arabidopsis and bts mutants suggested that Bnams4b may drive translocation of BTS to cause various toxic defects.

item.title: CaARF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana00g000236 Gene Symbol: CaARF9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Demonstrate that an auxin response factor, CaARF9, has dual roles in enhancing the immune resistance to Ralstonia solanacearum infection and in retarding plant growth by repressing the expression of its target genes as exemplified by Casmc4, CaLBD37, CaAPK1b and CaRROP1.

item.title: CsPPSR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G009550 Gene Symbol: CsPPSR1 Gene Name: Phloem Phosphate Stress-Repressed 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A cucumber protein, Phloem Phosphate Stress-Repressed 1(CsPPSR1), rapidly degrades in response to a phosphate stress.

item.title: DgnsLTP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgnsLTP Gene Name: nonspecific lipid transfer protein Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Ubiquitin membrane yeast two-hybrid (MYTH) system and bimolecular fluorescence complementation (BIFC) assays showed that DgTIL1 interacts with a nonspecific lipid transfer protein (DgnsLTP), which can promote peroxidase (POD) gene expression and POD activity to reduce the accumulation of reactive oxygen species (ROS) and improve resistance to cold stress in DgnsLTP transgenic chrysanthemum.

item.title: DgTIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgTIL1 Gene Name: temperature-induced lipocalin-1-like Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified a temperature-induced lipocalin-1-like gene (DgTIL1) from chrysanthemum and showed that it was notably induced in response to cold stress.

item.title: GmCOP1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.14G049700 Gene Symbol: GmCOP1b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: E3 ubiquitin ligase GmCOP1b negatively regulates the accumulation of soybean isoflavones.

item.title: GmPUB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G242900 Gene Symbol: GmPUB21 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: We conclude that GmPUB21 and GmDi19-5 collaborate to regulate drought and salinity tolerance via an ABA-dependent pathway.

item.title: LeACS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g095080.3.1 Gene Symbol: LeACS2 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Turnover of LeACS2, a wound-inducible 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid synthase in tomato, is regulated by phosphorylation/dephosphorylation.

item.title: LpHUB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LpHUB1 Gene Name: Bronsyn LE HUB1 Genome: Species: Lolium perenne Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of ubiquitin-like LpHUB1 gene confers drought tolerance in perennial ryegrass.

item.title: MaRZF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma02_p05740 Gene Symbol: MaRZF1 Gene Name: RING Zinc Finger 1 Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: RING-type ubiquitin E3 ligase MaRZF1 interacts with chlorophyll catabolic enzyme MaSGR1, which promotes the ubiquitination and proteasomal degradation of MaSGR1, causing the green ripening of banana fruit under high temperature.

item.title: MaSGR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MaSGR1 Gene Name: STAY-GREEN 1 Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: RING-type ubiquitin E3 ligase MaRZF1 interacts with chlorophyll catabolic enzyme MaSGR1, which promotes the ubiquitination and proteasomal degradation of MaSGR1, causing the green ripening of banana fruit under high temperature.

item.title: MdBEL7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdBEL7 Gene Name: BEL1-LIKE HOMEODOMAIN transcription factor 7 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: An apple (Malus domestica) BEL1-LIKE HOMEODOMAIN transcription factor 7 (MdBEL7), potentially functioning as a transcriptional repressor of the Chl catabolic genes (CCGs), including MdCLH, MdPPH2 and MdRCCR2, was identified as a partner of the ethylene-activated U-box type E3 ubiquitin ligase MdPUB24 in a yeast library screen.

item.title: MdBIM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000143208 Gene Symbol: MdBIM1 Gene Name: BES1-INTERACTING MYC-LIKE PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Brassinosteroid signaling regulator BIM1 (MdBIM1) integrates brassinolide and jasmonic acid signaling during cold tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdCIbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000662999 Gene Symbol: MdCIbHLH1 Gene Name: Malus domestica Cold-induced bHLH1 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdCIPK20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000320872 Gene Symbol: MdCIPK20 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 20 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: A protein kinase MdCIPK20 was found to phosphorylate and protect MdRGL2a from degradation, and it was essential for MdRGL2a-promoting anthocyanin accumulation.

item.title: MdCOP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000245133 Gene Symbol: MdCOP1 Gene Name: CONSTITUTIVELY PHOTOMORPHOGENIC 1 Genome: Genome Database for Rosaceae (GDR| https://www.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdCRF4 Gene Name: Malus domestica CYTOKININ RESPONSE FACTOR4 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdICE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000662999 Gene Symbol: MdICE1 Gene Name: MYC-type bHLH transcription factor ICE1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Further study showed that MdPUB23 directly interacted with MdICE1, promoting the ubiquitination-mediated degradation of the MdICE1 protein through the 26S-proteasome pathway and reducing the MdICE1-improved cold-stress tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdMAPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000237742 Gene Symbol: MdMAPK3 Gene Name: MITOGEN-ACTIVATED PROTEIN KINASE 3 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Ethylene enhances MdMAPK3-mediated phosphorylation of MdNAC72 to promote apple fruit softening.

item.title: MdMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000259614 Gene Symbol: MdMYB1 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 1 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdNAC72
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdNAC72 Gene Name: transcription factor NAM-ATAF1/2-CUC2 72 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor NAM-ATAF1/2-CUC2 72 (MdNAC72), which functions as a transcriptional repressor of the cell wall degradation-related gene POLYGALACTURONASE1 (MdPG1).

item.title: MdPHR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD05G1189400 Gene Symbol: MdPHR1 Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1126700 Gene Symbol: MdPRP6 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdPUB23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD14G1040300 Gene Symbol: MdPUB23 Gene Name: U-box-type E3 ubiquitin ligase Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple U-box-type E3 ubiquitin ligase MdPUB23 reduces cold-stress tolerance by degrading the cold-stress regulatory protein MdICE1.

item.title: MdPUB24
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdPUB24 Gene Name: U-box type E3 ubiquitin ligase Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Ethylene-activated MdPUB24 mediates ubiquitination of MdBEL7 to promote chlorophyll degradation in apple fruit.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000194473 MD01G1010900 Gene Symbol: MdPUB29 Gene Name: U-box E3 ubiquitin ligase Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdSINA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1082000 Gene Symbol: MdSINA1 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdRGL2a and MdCIPK20 were ubiquitinated and degraded by E3 ubiquitin ligases MdSINA1 and MdSINA2, respectively, both of which were activated in the presence of GA.

item.title: MdSINA11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD14G1054300 Gene Symbol: MdSINA11 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase 11 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: E3 ubiquitin ligases MdSINA4 and MdSINA11 regulate anthocyanin biosynthesis by targeting the IAA29-ARF5-1-ERF3 module in apple.
